Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron

Class Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron.Neuron
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BiasNeuron

    public class Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent the implementation of a neuron. Neurons use a sigmoid activation function
    Author:
    Nicolas Dutly
    See Also:
    activate(double)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Jama.Matrix input
      Describes a matrix containing the neurons input (nb_of_inputs x 1)
      protected double learningRate
      Describes the learning rate/constant, which governs how fast the weights shift during the back-propagation algorithm.
      protected int nb_of_inputs
      Describes the amount of inputs for a given neuron
      protected double neuronOutput
      Contains the neurons output [0-1]
      protected Jama.Matrix synapse_weights
      Represents the weights of the inputs of the neuron using a (nb_of_inputs x 1) Matrix.
      protected double weightedInput
      Contains the sum of the inputs multiplied with their weight

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Model.NeuralNetwork.Neuron(int nb_of_inputs)
      Create a new neuron

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected double activate(double weightedInput)
      Passes the weighted input to the sigmoid function, setting neuronOutput to the output of the sigmoid function.
      void adjustSynapseWeights(Jama.Matrix weightDelta)
      Adjusts neurons weight matrix by a given delta.
      void calculateWeightedInput()
      Calculates the neurons weighted input by summing up the inputs multiplied with their given weights.
      double getNeuronOutput()
      Getter for the neurons output
      Jama.Matrix getSynapse_weights()
      Getter for the neurons weight matrix
      double getWeightedInput()
      Getter for the neurons weighted input
      void process(Jama.Matrix input)
      Processes an input matrix, calculating the weighted input and passing it to the through the activation function
      double[] setRandomWeights()
      Generates null centered random double between [-1/sqrt(n),1/sqrt(n)] Only called upon neuron creation

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomWeights

        public double[] setRandomWeights()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates null centered random double between [-1/sqrt(n),1/sqrt(n)] Only called upon neuron creation
        Returns:
        the generated weight matrix (nb_of_inputs x 1)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when trying to assign random weights to weight that have been previously initialized.

      • calculateWeightedInput

        public void calculateWeightedInput()
        Calculates the neurons weighted input by summing up the inputs multiplied with their given weights.

      • activate

        protected double activate(double weightedInput)
        Passes the weighted input to the sigmoid function, setting neuronOutput to the output of the sigmoid function.
        Parameters:
        weightedInput - The neurons weighted input
        Returns:
        The neurons output

      • process

        public void process(Jama.Matrix input)
        Processes an input matrix, calculating the weighted input and passing it to the through the activation function
        Parameters:
        input - the neurons input Matrix (nb_of_inputs x 1)
        See Also:
        activate(double)

      • adjustSynapseWeights

        public void adjustSynapseWeights(Jama.Matrix weightDelta)
        Adjusts neurons weight matrix by a given delta. Used in the back-propagation algorithm
        Parameters:
        weightDelta - The delta Matrix to be added to the neurons weights.
